sentence.Network_en: She used the day to catch up with administrative tasks.
sentence.Network_cn: 她白天忙着处理行政工作。

sentence.Network_en: Other industries have had to sack managers to reduce administrative costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他行业只得精简管理人员以减少行政开支。

sentence.Network_en: In practice a graduate tax is an administrative nightmare.
sentence.Network_cn: 毕业税具体操作起来不啻一场行政噩梦。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin administrativus, from administrat- 'managed', from the verb administrare (see administrate)

entry.def: Administrative work involves organizing and supervising an organization or institution.

example.ex: Other industries have had to sack managers to reduce administrative costs...
example.tran: 其他行业只得精简管理人员以减少行政开支。

example.ex: The project will have an administrative staff of 12.
example.tran: 项目将包括一个12人组成的管理小组。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or responsible for administration

stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]男→adj.管理的,行政的
minister部长+y表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后→ministry部门

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理, 经营, 行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]→n.管理, 经营, 行政部门
mini小+ature表名词→小物品→小画象
mini小+ster人→小人→古代大臣称呼自己"小人"→部长,大臣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予
使减少到最少,使降到最低

di分开+mini小+ish表动词→变小,减少

Sentence.sentence: Then I went into local government because I found I was more interested in the administrative side.
A computer degree is a must for administrative work
Then I went into local government because I found I was more interested in the administrative side.
He prefers teaching to administrative work.

means.word_mean: 行政的, 管理的;经营的

sentences.en: He has a lot of administrative work to do.
sentences.cn: 他有许多行政工作要做。

sentences.en: He regarded all these administrative details as beneath his notice.
sentences.cn: 他认为行政管理上的这些琐事都不值一顾。

sentences.en: The administrative burden must be lifted from local government.
sentences.cn: 必须解除地方政府的行政负担。

sentences.en: The complex administrative arrangements render the decision-making process somewhat opaque.
sentences.cn: 复杂的行政协商使决策过程透明度不高。

sentences.en: The State Council exercises the function and power to appoint and remove administrative personnel according to the provisions of the law.
sentences.cn: 国务院有依照法律规定行使任命行政人员的职权。

sentences.en: The students sat in at the administrative building to protest against discrimination of race.
sentences.cn: 学生们在办公大楼静坐,抗议种族歧视。

sentences.en: We deem very highly of his administrative talent.
sentences.cn: 我们非常看重他的管理才能。
非战斗性行政勤务; 行政勤务部队
